definition: to get angry/to take offense/angry/vitality/liveliness
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
full of vitality
associated gas (petrochemical engineering)
see 生機盎然|生机盎然[sheng1 yi4 ang4 ran2]
to displease
to be quick to take offence/to have a short fuse
pinyin: dong4 bu5 dong4 jiu4 sheng1 qi4

sentences.english: He jazzed up the room with some bright red curtains.
sentences.chinese: 他用一些鮮紅的窗簾將房間裝飾得更具生氣。

sentences.english: We want someone for the job who has lots of pizzazz .
sentences.chinese: 我們想要有生氣的人幹這項工作。

sentences.english: It is research that is guaranteed to delight men - and infuriate the women in their lives.
sentences.chinese: 這項研究結果一定會讓男人高興，惹女人生氣。

sentences.english: A lot of people are saying, "Enough of this kind of effete culture.
sentences.chinese: 很多人都在說，“我們已經厭倦了這毫無生氣的文化。

sentences.english: He was very angry at the remarks made by his teacher.
sentences.chinese: 他對老師的批語很生氣。

sentences.english: The president is telling all of these people that he is very angry with Nordstrom.
sentences.chinese: 總統是在告訴所有這些人，他對諾德斯特龍很生氣。

sentences.english: and the mother was very, very disturbed.
sentences.chinese: 拿着水槍玩耍，噴得到處都是水，讓媽媽非常生氣。

sentences.english: He dashed the cup down in his anger.
sentences.chinese: 他生氣了，使勁把杯子擲下。

sentences.english: He went outside the walls, sat under a shady plant and sulked.
sentences.chinese: 他走到圍牆外面，站在一棵蔭涼的植物下生氣。

sentences.english: I always made you angry, do not be persuaded, of course, has now admitted the mistake was.
sentences.chinese: 我總是惹你生氣，還不聽勸，當然現在已經知錯了。

sentences.english: I know you’re still mad at me for ditching you off.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你還在爲我放你鴿子在生氣。

sentences.english: They make the circus lively and cause people to laugh。
sentences.chinese: 他們使馬戲充滿生氣，使觀衆捧腹大笑。

sentences.english: He said Ms. Choi became upset when she found the dog alone at his home.
sentences.chinese: 他說崔順實發現小狗獨自待在他家以後變得很生氣。

sentences.english: I hope I didn't offend you.

definition: this kind of/so/this way/like this/such
to get angry
to play a joke/to make fun of/to joke
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
because/owing to/on account of
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
happy/glad/willing (to do sth)/in a cheerful mood
to take the initiative/to do sth of one's own accord/spontaneous/active/opposite: passive 被動|被动[bei4 dong4]/drive (of gears and shafts etc)
character/temperament/disposition/bad temper/CL:個|个[ge4]
to refuse/to decline/to reject
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
conversely/in reverse order/in an opposite direction
noisy/cacophonous/to make noise/to disturb/to vent (feelings)/to fall ill/to have an attack (of sickness)/to go in (for some activity)/to joke
this/this kind of/this sort of/this type of
unworthy/to let down/I'm sorry/excuse me/pardon me/if you please/sorry? (please repeat)
